txt.en: Annoyingly Aggressive Avanc Must be Stopped!

'Since you are heading in that direction anyhow, why don't you do us all a favour and put down as many of those annoying avanc as you can. Not only will I have my revenge, but it will make the waterways and roads safer for other travellers as well.'
Drambor has asked you to defeat annoyingly aggressive avanc along the rivers in southern Lamedon.
You should let Drambor know that the riverways and roads are safer with fewer annoying avanc laying in wait to chomp on missing bags and traveller legs.\n\nDrambor is in Calembel.
River-avanc in Lamedon have grown overly bold, aggressive, and frankly, quite annoying.

'Thank you for taking care of those obnoxious lizards, my friend. Father is sure to be happy that I took matters into my own hands to deal with this issue.\n\n'Uhm, with your help of course, that is.'
